name: Tahini
description: A dynamic, interpreted and impurely functional programming language with testing and design-by-contract features.

name: GDSC Ideas Portal
description: Built the frontend for an idea proposals and discussion portal built for GDSC-VIT. I coordinated with a designer and a backend developer to build this site, which is designed to hold hundreds of ideas submitted by users, along with a status tracking and commenting system.

name: Riviera'23 and Gravitas'23 Websites
description: Volunteered as a member of my university's technical team to build the websites for Riviera'23 (with over 30,000 students from 650+ colleges) and Gravitas'23, the annual cultural and technical festivals, respectively, of VIT Vellore. For the latter, I also coordinated the frontend team in integrating the payments gateway for merch and events registration.

name: Nock
description: Built the backend for a team-based meeting attendance app.

name: Career Node
description: Developed the frontend for a project built during the Yantra hackathon, as an attempt to devise cutting-edge technological solutions leveraging AI to empower individuals seeking educational and career transitions. The project won the education track at the hackathon.
